description: For sale is a 1965 Ford Mustang located in our Indianapolis showroom. This Ã¢??65 Mustang is powered by a 302 cubic-inch V8 engine backed by an automatic transmission. Options on this 1965 Ford Mustang include AM/FM Radio with Cassette, AC, Seat Belts, Vinyl Interior, Rally Wheels and Manual Convertible Top.Here we have THE Classic American Muscle Car! In 1965 the Ford Mustang debuted as a simple sports car powered by a 170 cid six cylinder with a pair of V8's as options. Originally named for the fighter plane, the P-51 Mustang and later the horse Mustang became the emblem. Buyers loved its low price, long hood, short trunk styling, and its many options and Ford loved its high-volume sales. When you see the Deluxe Pony Interior for the first time you will never want to sit in any pony car ever again. Take a seat behind the wheel and you will surely feel like you are back in 1965 again. This car is amazing inside and out and is anxiously waiting to be added to your collection today! If you are looking for a fun car to drive, a cool classic to show off, or just want to stand out in a crowd of modern vehicles that all look identical to each other, then this is awesome 1965 Ford Mustang is the classic car for you!This 1965 Ford Mustang for sale is located in our Indianapolis Showroom and can be seen in greater detail, including a High Def video at www.GatewayClassicCars.com. Please call (317)688-1100 or email us at INDY@gatewayclassiccars.com for additional information.
title: 1965 Ford Mustang
